info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 23 at 5:18PM CDT until September 23 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock AR
info.description:
At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Dillen... Bertha... Mineral Springs Recreation Area... Ozone... Haw Creek Falls Campground... Fort Douglas... Catalpa... Treat... Oark... Sand Gap... Wolf Pen Campground... Friley... Yale... Simpson...
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN POPE AND NORTHERN JOHNSON COUNTIES
NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 7:45 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 7:45 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 23 at 5:18PM CDT until September 23 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock AR

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN POPE AND NORTHERN JOHNSON COUNTIES
SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 7:45 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:45 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
